title: Drawing, Fame or Victory in a Chariot, Sala di Nike, Palazzo Naldi, Faenza, 1803
title_raw: Fame or Victory in a Chariot, Sala di Nike, Palazzo Naldi, Faenza
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash over black chalk on laid paper
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: Figure riding over clouds in chariot drawn by two horses, followed by two flying putti, one with trumpet and wreath. Temple front shown in central distance.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, Fame or Victory in a Chariot, Sala di Nike, Palazzo Naldi, Faenza, 1803. Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash over black chalk on laid paper. 
Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-1646
